name: HackX
description: The complete Hackathon System - Registration, Name Tag Creation, Mentor Queue and Judging

GMAIL_USERNAME.description: The Gmail account used to send emails to members using the system

GMAIL_PASSWORD.description: The password for for the Gmail account

DROPBOX_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Dropbox Access Token - This will be used to upload resumes

REMIND_URL.description: Remind.com URL so that members will get notifications about events happening
